title: Bright 1 bd 1 bath close to Historic Downtown Littleton! 1085 W Lilley
posting_body: ['Address: 1085 W. Lilley Ave. #2 , Littleton, CO 80120', 'Rent: $1200', 'Bedrooms: 1', 'Bathrooms: 1', 'Available: MID SEPTEMBER 2022!!!', 'Type: Apartment', 'Bright 1 bed 1 bath close to Historic Downtown!', 'Come live at Woodlawn apartments where comfort and quality meet convenience and affordability.', 'These bright, open and inviting one bedroom apartments have new windows, air conditioning, and on site laundry.', 'The hallways are all inside for a private feel.', 'Located nearby are Bemis library, ACC, several restaurants, Woodlawn Shopping Center, and the Littleton Historical Museum.', 'This is a great place for anyone to call home at an affordable price.', 'Apply Today!', 'For showings please contact', 'show contact info', '.', 'No Pets.', 'There is a monthly $45 utility fee for this apartment.', '**', "**We are looking for a tenant with previous rental history and verifiable income around 2.5x's the rent.", 'We also check credit and criminal history.', 'If there is an issue in any area you may be required to pay a larger deposit.', 'The application fee is $40 per adult.', '****', 'INCO Property Management & Sales', 'Leasing Department', '6640 S Broadway Suite A', 'Centennial, CO 80121', 'show contact info']
